metadata.title: CVE-2021-46283 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
nf_tables_newset in net/netfilter/nf_tables_api.c in the Linux kernelbefore 5.12.13 allows local users to cause a denial of service (NULLpointer dereference and general protection fault) because of the missinginitialization for nft_set_elem_expr_alloc. A local user can set anetfilter table expression in their own namespace.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-46283` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.5.0-9-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic - 5.15.0-25.25
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-generic-64k - 5.15.0-25.25
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1008-aws - 5.15.0-1004.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-azure - 5.15.0-1003.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1007-gcp - 5.15.0-1003.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1009-ibm - 5.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1010-oracle - 5.15.0-1002.4
No subscription required

linux-image-6.5.0-1005-raspi - 5.15.0-1005.5
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency - 5.15.0-24.24
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-9-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-24.24
No subscription required
